text: If guns are outlawed, then anyone who owns a gun will, by definition, be an outlaw. Therefore, if guns are outlawed, only outlaws will have guns. But if only outlaws had guns, that would make outlaws more powerful than law-abiding people. We want to avoid this bad situation. Therefore, we must never outlaw guns.
